name: Frameless Glass Shower Corner Enclosure 24 x 26 x 72 In. in Brushed Nickel by Prosto
description:
The Prosto Frameless Shower:  

Finally, there is an affordable option for beautiful, frameless shower glass.  Prosto's innovative design couples seamless, clear, 3/8" thick tempered glass with high-quality hardware to produce an effortless, modern design.

How You Save with Prosto:

Our glass is cut in bulk to save on costly manufacturing expenses.  We also keep a lean inventory, but provide a huge range of size configurations to fit almost any opening.  We pass these cost savings over to you, and in the end, it’s half the cost of custom glass.  

Sizing:

Specific panel sizes and shower min and max sizes are included in the product specifications.  Hinges, magnets, and seals can all be adjusted to meet the specified min and max for each dimension.

Shower Info:

- All panels are 3/8" thick (10mm), clear, premium tempered glass

- Doors/A panels are pre-drilled for hardware.  A panels are symmetrical, to hinge on either side to swing open in either direction. 

- B panels (if included in your shower configuration) are predrilled for glass-to-glass hinges to attach A panel

- C panels (if included in your shower configuration) will attach to the other wall; either at a 90 degree angle for a corner shower, or on the opposite wall for enclave/straight enclosures.

- All showers include the hinges and handle as specified in Chrome, Oil Rubbed Bronze, or Brushed Nickel.

- Magnet seals are included but optional to close the front of your door.

- 2 72" seals are included but optional to seal door in rear (cut around hinges) or in place of the magnet in the front of the door

- Braces (if needed will be included) to attach the B panel for added support.  Additional Braces can be added to your order for large C-panels if desired- call to update your order prior to shipping.

Installation is a breeze, consider adding these items to your order:

- Silicone

- Installation Kit

- Glass Sealer

About Us:

Prosto showers operates out of Denver, CO.  We are a small, family-owned business that strives to find innovative solutions to save our customers money and compete with the big guys.  We provide free online and phone support for all of our customers 6 days a week. We also provide videos and tutorials to aid contractors and DIYers with installation.
short_description:
Finally, there is an affordable option for beautiful, frameless shower glass.  Prosto's innovative design couples seamless, clear glass with high-quality hardware to produce an effortless, modern design.

  • All panels are 3/8" thick (10mm), clear, premium tempered glass
  • Beautiful, high-quality hardware included
  • Delivered to your home in just 2 weeks
